text: 4: Advent of Chaos
trans: 4:混乱降临

text: The party finally leaves the cave. At that moment, Lyria senses not one, but multiple presences of primal beasts, none of which feel like the so-called guardian of Auguste.
trans: 姬塔一行朝着洞窟出口前进。就在这时，露莉亚感应到了星晶兽的气息。一行人猜测Albacore正在接近，但据露莉亚所言，她感应到远处有多个气息。Sig说他从未听说过yostiyala岛上出现过Albacore以外的星晶兽，但露莉亚却说气息多得数不胜数。

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Huh? Ah!
trans: 诶！？呃……诶诶！？

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: What is it, Lyria? Why are you...
trans: 怎么了，露莉亚！发生什么了

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: I can feel it.
trans: 星、星晶兽的气息……

name: Sig
text: Really? Is Albacore coming this way?
trans: 什么……？Albacore正朝这边，接近吗？

name: Walder
text: In that case, I, the great Walder, will defeat it before it can attack!
trans: 那么，就由我Walder大人，将它打得落花流水！

name: Io/伊欧
text: Whatever! Stop saying things that are never going to happen!
trans: 真是的！不要说自己做不到的事情啊！

name: Walder
text: Yeesh... You don't have to be so harsh about it...
trans: 呜,不、不用全盘否定吧……

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: No, you're wrong!
trans: 不、不是的！

name: Walder
text: Oh! See, Lyria understands me. That primal beast doesn't stand a chance.
trans: 哦哦！露莉亚你能理解我吗！我一定也能对付星晶兽……

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Sorry, that's not what I meant...
trans: 啊，那个……不是说这个……

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: It's not coming toward us.
trans: 星晶兽的气息不是在接近这里……

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: It's kind of far away, but I sense a lot of them!
trans: 在稍微远一点的地方……但是……有很多很多的气息！

name: Vyrn/碧
text: No way! We've gotta see it for ourselves! Come on, no time to rest!
trans: 喂喂喂……总之看来，只能继续前进了……

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: Several primal beasts? I wonder what could be happening on this island.
trans: 多个星晶兽吗?现在这座岛上到底发生了什么？

name: Io/伊欧
text: Do other primal beasts besides Albacore ever appear on this island?
trans: 我说,这座岛上除了Albacore以外,还会出现其他星晶兽吗？

name: Sig
text: Not to my knowledge. The stories my ancestors told me never mentioned something like that.
trans: 从没听说过啊,即使是上一代和上上代也从来没提到过这样的事。

name: Sig
text: I've heard that a serpentine primal beast rules over the seas of the main island of Auguste.
trans: 倒是听说过奥古斯特列岛的本岛那边有司掌大海的海龙星晶兽……

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: It's not just two though. There are so many that I can't count them all!
trans: 不是……两个。还有更多、更多……无数的气息……！

name: Monster/魔物
text: Groaar!
trans: 呜哇哇哇!

name: Sig
text: The situation is getting out of hand. We need to deal with this small fry and rejoin the others!
trans: 总觉得情况有点不妙啊,赶紧解决掉这些魔物，尽快和大家汇合吧！
scene_evt140731_cp4_q4_s20
